plugins.name: Tailwind CSS Styles Generator
plugins.description:
Generate all the Tailwind CSS text, color and shadow styles right into your design panel, created for designers and developers using Tailwind CSS in their amazing projects.


A Little Back Story

I'm a huge fan of Tailwind CSS.


When creating designs where I knew I'll use Tailwind CSS for development, it became frustrating when I had to manually create the styles and copy colors from Tailwind CSS site.


Even more frustrating was when I had to manually create those styles time and again for multiple projects.


That's when the idea of creating this plugin hit my mind.


I searched for pre-existing plugins but they barely provided this functionality.


So, here it is.


Right now it generates only text, color and shadow styles.


Anticipating your comments and ideas on how the plugin can be improved.

plugins.name: Appear 2.0: Design Helper
plugins.description:
Appear 2.0 is a powerful design system helper for Figma. It provides an intuitive UI to speed up repetitive tasks like converting between iOS and Android components, resizing screens, and managing external libraries — all in one place.


How It Works:


Set Up Component Naming:

  1. Use identifiers like /ios and /android in your component names.
  2. Example: Button/ios, Button/android.


Save Parent Components:

  1. Open the file with your main components and click “Save main components”.
  2. This step is required for plugins that reference external libraries.


Select & Convert:

  1. Select any frame or components and click “Convert to iOS” or “Convert to Android” to automatically swap instances.


Customize Settings (Optional):

  1. You can change the default identifiers (/ios, /android) to match your own naming convention.
  2. Adjust default screen widths (375 for iOS, 360 for Android).
  3. Enable auto-resizing for screens after conversion.


Naming Rules:

✔️ Good examples:

  1. component_name[ios]
  2. componentname/ios
  3. component(name)-android


❌ Bad examples:

  1. component name ios
  2. ioscomponentnameios
  3. componentname/ios/ios


Identifiers must be unique within the component name and not repeated multiple times.


Important Notes:

Screen resizing works only for frames with resizable content inside.


When components share variant properties, the properties must:

  1. Have identical names
  2. Contain the same value sets
  3. Preferably appear in the same order


Coming Soon:

  1. FAQ Section
plugins.tagline: Design smarter across platforms — from naming to resizing to instant conversion.

plugins.name: Translated
plugins.description:
The TranslationOS plugin for Figma allows you to translate your content directly from Figma in a professional, easy and efficient way with no manual effort. Send your designs for translation in just a few clicks and without switching to other tools.


TranslationOS, by Translated, is the first TMS that directly connects your content with a team of committed linguists, selected from a pool of 519,816 freelancers, trained on your style guides and managed by experienced Language Leads and Project Managers. Customizable dashboards give you access to any KPI that is important to you, including financial projections, quality performance, and information about the linguists involved in your projects.


The TranslationOS connector seamlessly integrates Figma with your TranslationOS solution, streamlining the entire localization process. Figma users can effortlessly send content to TranslationOS and, once translated, retrieve the localized content. They gain full visibility into the process and have control over various elements, such as cost approval and review, making it an exceptionally straightforward experience.


To use the connector, please contact our team
plugins.tagline: Localize Figma designs effortlessly with Translated

plugins.name: Codia AI Illustrator: Adobe Illustrator/EPS to Editable Figma
plugins.description:
Unlock the power of Adobe Illustrator directly within Figma! Our tool lets you import your Illustrator (.ai and .eps) files into Figma with ease, preserving all vector layers, editable text, and design elements. Say goodbye to the hassle of exporting and reformatting — now you can bring logos, graphics, and complex designs straight from Illustrator into Figma as fully editable vectors. Ideal for designers and teams, this tool is perfect for keeping your workflow smooth and efficient, empowering you to build on existing designs without compromising quality or flexibility. Import, edit, and iterate seamlessly across platforms!


Key Features and Advantages:


1. Fast Conversion: Instantly import Adobe Illustrator (.ai and .eps) files into Figma, saving you time and effort with a seamless transition.

2. Fully Editable, Fully Vectorized: Maintain the quality and flexibility of your designs. Imported elements stay in vector format with all text layers fully editable, so you can make changes on the go.

3. Preserves Layer Structure: Keep your layer organization intact. Every element is imported with its original structure, ensuring easy navigation and editing in Figma.

4. Perfect for Logos and Graphics: Ideal for logos, icons, and intricate graphics, this tool supports high-quality vector graphics without loss of detail or quality.

5. Seamless, Software-Free Workflow: Work across platforms without the need for third-party converters or additional software. Just import directly into Figma for a streamlined design process from start to finish.

6. Privacy Protection: Your design files stay secure throughout the import process, ensuring privacy and safeguarding your creative assets. No external servers or tools are used, keeping your data protected.

accepted.name: Codia.AI
accepted.description: Anything to Design, Anything to Code.

plugins.tagline: Seamlessly Bring Your Adobe Illustrator Designs to Figma

plugins.name: Lasso Tool
plugins.description:
Draw a freehand selection and copy or cut all layers within it in one click. Like in Photoshop!

Just move your mouse, and this plugin will generate a selection following your cursor's path. Regardless of the size or type of layers — whether it's vector, text, frame, group, section, or any other layer type — Lasso Tool seamlessly handles it all.


Three instruments:

  1. Standard Lasso that follows your cursor;
  2. Magnetic Lasso to snap cursor onto nearby shapes;
  3. Select any existing vector and use it as a selection.


Learn more at the website. Open-source!

plugins.name: Content Auto with AI
plugins.description:
The "Real Ipsum AI Generator | AI Powered Random Content Creator" Figma plugin leverages the power of AI to accelerate your design processes and boost your creativity. This plugin, with its slogan "Free AI Powered Random Content Creator with One Click," offers a user-friendly experience by generating unique and engaging textual content for your project designs with just a single click.


Eliminating the frequent challenge designers face in finding and placing realistic text content, the Real Ipsum AI Generator provides customizable content for all types of projects. Capable of producing a wide range of content types—from blog posts and product descriptions to user comments and beyond—this plugin brings your design prototypes closer to real-world scenarios.


This plugin's extremely easy-to-use feature allows designers to focus on enhancing the quality of their actual designs, rather than spending time on text content. All you need to do is select the text area where you want the content generated and activate the AI-powered content generator with a single click.


Features of the Real Ipsum AI Generator:


One-Click Content Creation: Fill your text areas with realistic content without needing to navigate any interface, all with just a single click.


Broad Content Variety: Generate various types of content including blog posts, product descriptions, user comments, and any other type you can think of.


Customizable Content: Tailor the type of content to the needs of your projects.


Time Savings: Quickly generate realistic content, speeding up your design process and increasing your productivity.


Boost Your Creativity: Focus on your design without worrying about text content, freeing up your creativity.


Elevate your design process to a new level with the "Real Ipsum AI Generator | AI Powered Random Content Creator." Try it now and enrich your designs with AI-powered realistic content, all for free!


Contributors:


@gorkemyildiz

Send me a brief email at grkmyldz58@gmail.com.


Thank you!

plugins.name: Content Generator AI
plugins.description:
Introduction


Content Generator AI is a powerful Figma plugin designed to help you generate realistic content for your text layers using AI.


How it works


  1. Select one or multiple text layers.
  2. Run the Content Generator AI plugin.
  3. Describe the kind of content you want to generate.
  4. Click Generate Content!


Note: If you're using this plugin to populate data in a data table, you can only do one column of data at a time. It does not have knowledge or the ability to populate different data for multiple columns at the same time.


Features:


  • Easy-to-Use Interface: Input your OpenAI API key and prompt directly in the plugin's UI.
  • Dynamic Content Generation: Generate text content based on custom prompts provided by you.
  • Auto Close Option: Optionally auto-close the plugin after content generation.
  • Prompt History: Displays your previous prompts to re-run them quickly.
  • Search: Search your prompt history.
  • Seamless Integration: Apply generated content directly to the selected text layers in your Figma file.


Requirements


You MUST have an OpenAI project API key (it looks like "sk-proj-") and have some credits/money loaded into your OpenAI account in order to use this plugin. Sign up at OpenAI to obtain your API key.


Sample Content Prompts


  • Random, diverse full names
  • Phone numbers from Cupertino
  • Random numbers between 75.0% and 100% to one decimal place
  • Random statuses from the following: Complete, Pending, Error
  • Timestamps in the format mm/dd/yyyy, hh:mm AM


Support

For any issues or support, send me a DM on Twitter @thejmoore.

accepted.name: Jon Moore
accepted.description: Principal, Product Design, AI Platform at Salesforce

plugins.tagline: Generate realistic text content with AI

plugins.name: Yunser Design
plugins.description:
Quickly generate components.


快速生成组件。


selecting a layer, click the button to generate it.


选择图层，快速生成组件并替换图层。



## Commands


* `Auto Layout Fixed Size`: Set auto layout to fixed width and height.

* `1/2 width of parent`: Set the layer width to 1/2 of the parent layer.

* `1/3 width of parent`: Set the layer width to 1/3 of the parent layer.

* `1/4 width of parent`: Set the layer width to 1/4 of the parent layer.

* `Frame All`: Wrap frame to all selected layers.

* `Swap Position`: Select two layers to swap them.



========·========



## 功能说明


该插件致力于让设计更加快速化、工程化。目前功能还很简陋，很多功能还在试探。


插件提供了一些常用的快速命令，让设计更加高效，让我们尽可能摆脱鼠标工作。



## 支持的命令：


* `Auto Layout Fixed Size`: 设置自动布局为固定宽高。

* `1/2 width of parent`: 设置图层宽度为父图层的 1/2。

* `1/3 width of parent`: 设置图层宽度为父图层的 1/3。

* `1/4 width of parent`: 设置图层宽度为父图层的 1/4。

* `Frame All`: 把所有选中的图层用 Frame 包裹起来。

* `Swap Position`: 选中两个图层，交换位置。

* `Radius xx`: 选中多个图层，快速设置圆角。

* 开发常用

* `Copy as DataUrl`: 复制为 Data URL，可用于网页图片 `src`。

* `Copy as Path Data`: 复制为 svg path 的 `d` 属性。

plugins.name: Tidy Hues
plugins.description:
Tidy Hues is a Figma plugin that allows you change just the hue of any layers you have selected.


Getting Started

When you first start the plugin, you will be greeted with an interface that has a number input, a slider, and an Apply button. As soon as you enter a number in the text field or use the slider, the button will change to the color of your currently selected hue.


If you select some layers in your file that have any Solid or Gradient fills, and hit the Apply button, it will change all of the hue values of the colors in those layers to the hue you have selected in the plugin. The saturation, lightness, and opacity of your layers will all remain the same.


Found a bug or have an idea?

This is a team of one, but if you have any good ideas or constructive feedback, please do not hesitate to share your thoughts by creating a new issue - screen captures are welcomed.


Show your support

If you find this plugin useful, feel free to buy me a 🍺 at my Patreon page. Thanks! 🙏


Contribute

  • Run yarn to install dependencies.
  • Run yarn build:watch to start webpack in watch mode.
  • Open Figma > Plugins > Development > New Plugin... and choose manifest.json file from this repo.
  • Create a Pull Request for your branch

plugins.name: Figma to CAD
plugins.description:
Figma to CAD is built for importing and exporting AutoCAD compatible format files.


You can now export your home plan into dxf file and open it with other professional 3D design softwares like SketchUp, AutoCAD, 3dsMax and etc.


Or import dxf file and do further edits in figma.


Step1: Select your drawings.

Step2: Run Figma to CAD plugin.

Step3: Click "Export DXF" to save dxf files.

Step4: Change selection then click "Update" and "Export DXF" to export new selections as dxf file.

plugins.name: Storyboard Creator
plugins.description:
This plugin makes it easier to build storyboards and format them for export within Figma.


INSTRUCTIONS: 

  1. Create a new Filmstrip from the plugin menu.
  2. Build your sequence in the Filmstrip. Compose your image within the Image object of each Frame. Frames can be rearranged, added, and deleted as you’d like.
  3. When you’re done composing, select your Filmstrip and use the “Create Storyboard from Filmstrip” menu item to generate a formatted Storyboard.
  4. Iterate on the Filmstrip and regenerate Storyboards as you’d like!


ADDITIONAL FEATURES / NOTES:

  1. From the menu, you can create an additional Frame of common film aspect ratios. You can drag these into your filmstrip and duplicate to change your Storyboard’s aspect ratio, or mix & match.
  2. By default, the plugin will automatically number your frames in the order they appear in the Filmstrip. You can override these numbers by unlocking the “#.” text object and editing the text to whatever label you’d like.


See an example at this demo file.


I made this to enable a personal workflow for making and laying out storyboards in Figma. Maybe someone else will find it useful too! :)

plugins.name: Felix AI - Design Copilot
plugins.description:
Felix is a context-aware reasoning application, a digital assistant powered by GPT-4o that can understand your design selections in Figma. You can generate code, request specific tasks in relation to your selections right in Figma!


Felix was created to assist in the software development workflow, and is intended to assist designers and engineers alike in translating designs into the structured information you need.


Felix now supports multi-message chat threads, and comes with Tools; prebuilt prompts that enable you to get started on a number of tasks:


  1. Programming a design with CSS/HTML/JS
  2. Programming a design with React and Tailwind
  3. UX research protocols
  4. Complexity Estimates for Planning
  5. Converting a Design into React


felixforfigma.com


How it Works

Just select a screen or component, type in a question or request, and click the send button, and right away you’ll see the response stream in.


Felix collects and structures the information within your designs, and works with an AI language model to provide insights and perform tasks with your exact design.


Felix can give thorough feedback, call out potential accessibility issue areas, convert designs to code, generate UX research protocols, generate mock data based on given fields, create alternative copy, and anything else you can think of!


Getting Started

You’ll need an OpenAI API key to get started. You can get one easily from their platform site. Sign up for an OpenAI API key here.


Other than the cost for generations, Felix AI is free to use!

(I'll soon release subscriptions and services to simplify the process.)


There’s a maximum to the context windows of each model, so for now Felix handles a few screens or components at a time. Costs are in the cents per generation. GPT-3.5 is great for easy questions, and prices can range from 1-2 cents per generation.


GPT-4 is much smarter and can handle complex tasks like those in the Tools, and will cost anywhere from 2 to 15 cents or so with a large selection. It depends on the complexity and size of the design.



Security

Design selection data is only sent upon clicking the send button, and OpenAI doesn't train with data sent to their API, and neither does Felix.


You’ll need to keep your API key private, and I recommend setting a low spend limit of around $10.00 on their website before getting started for peace of mind!


Thank you for taking a look and feel free to rea﻿ch out to me on Twitter with any feedback or bugs!
plugins.tagline: The Context Aware Reasoning Application & AI Design Assistant

plugins.name: Docfy Design
plugins.description:
Documente processos de design de forma a torná-los entregáveis autoconsumíveis.


O Docfy é um plugin que possibilita times design a implementarem uma estrutura de documentação única, consistente e escalável.


Em uma BU, Tribo e, às vezes, dentro de uma mesma squad, de designer para designer, falhamos em manter um sistema consistente, único e escalável de se documentar processos dentro do time de design, com entregáveis, vezes pouco interpretáveis, inconclusivos, inconsistentes, que geram descrença na relevância e valor dos processos de design, o que torna o ato de se compartilhar a informação oneroso tanto para quem a busca quanto para quem simplesmente a transmite. Como time, precisamos ter capacidade de encontrar formas para capturar, arquivar, pesquisar e compartilhar o conhecimento de maneira a melhorar a produtividade individual.


Encare sua Documentação como um Produto®

Pense em uma documentação como um produto, que será consumido por um grupo específico usuários (Designers, DEVs, PMs, líderes funcionais, de entrega, stakeholders), e estes, usam este produto tanto de forma estratégica, para tomada de decisão, quanto de forma tática, na priorização, backlog, handoff para o desenvolvimento.


Nesse sentido, como tem sido a experiência do que você consome e como está a experiência do que você entrega, qual o nível de autonomia e satisfação na utilização deste produto? Qual foi sua experiência ao ter que dar continuidade ou ainda, em onboarding, precisar entender um projeto a partir da documentação de um outro designer?


Document Design System

A ausência de um sistema consistente, único e escalável de se documentar processos dentro do time, Não é sobre uma "Templatização" de processos, o propósito está no entendimento sobre o valor de se manter a responsabilidade de se documentar processos de maneira a criar materiais de fácil leitura e interpretação, descentralizando a informação.


Uso

Use o Docfy Design Plug-in clicando em ”Try it out”, ao criar um “New Design File” no Figma, iniciando um novo projeto, execute o plug-in para que seja configurado uma estrutura de documentação padrão com diversos templates e tutoriais com boas práticas. (o Plug-in criará uma estrutura páginas e removerá a ”Page 1” padrão no arquivo do Figma)

accepted.description: O Docfy é um plugin que possibilita times design a implementarem uma estrutura de documentação única, consistente e escalável.

plugins.tagline: Use uma estrutura de documentação única, consistente e escalável.

plugins.name: Smoothing Uncapped
plugins.description:
Enhance Figma's corner smoothing on large rounded corners


The problem

Have you ever noticed that Figma's corner smoothing doesn't seem to work well on big rounded corners? As the radius gets bigger, the effect becomes less noticeable.


Usage

Pick a rectangle with a large corner radius. Make sure "corner smoothing" is not 0%.

Right-click on the rectangle and select "Smoothing Uncapped" from the menu.
plugins.tagline: Enhance Figma's corner smoothing on large rounded corners

plugins.name: Color Contrast Grid
plugins.description:
Not sure if the color you are using meets the contrast ratio?

Try this plug-in.

It outputs the contrast ratios for all possible combinations of color styles.


Main Functions

  • Generates a table of contrast ratios for all local color styles
  • Flexible as each part is componentized
  • Enables to limit the display according to the contrast.


Future updates

  • Allow output of exact contrast ratio values for colors with opacity less than 100%.
  • Allows you to add colors manually.


Bug reports and feedback welcome!


自分の使っているカラーがコントラスト比を満たしているかわからない？

そんな時はこのプラグインを使ってみましょう。

主な機能

  • local color styleの全通りのコントラスト比の表を生成

  • コントラストに応じて表示を制限することが可能になります

plugins.name: Scribble Pal
plugins.description:
Scribble Pal is especially made for iPad with Apple Pencil.


Create new stickies with text, as well as modify text on a selected sticky, shape or text box. The large text writing area works with either a keyboard or Apple Pencil with Scribble enabled.


Use "Set Anchor" on an existing sticky, shape or text box to set it as the origin point for additional stickies you want to add.


Important Notes: Updating text in stickies and shapes with mixed styles (e.g. multiple fonts, underline) will remove all prior formatting. Also, this plugin will not work with Figurative; that app does not support Scribble. Instead, use Safari on iPad or the Figma iPadOS app (for FigJam files).

accepted.name: Nelson Taruc
accepted.description: My design philosophy: Focus. Boost signal, kill noise. Solve the first problem. Embrace uncertainty.

plugins.name: Swift Package Exporter
plugins.description:
Generate SwiftUI from your design tokens and export as package. Once included in Xcode, developers will have access to design tokens directly through Xcode's editor and code complete.


To get started install the plugin and run it on this sample file.


  • Demo video
  • Getting started video


Learn more: https://figmatoswift.com


👉 Supported Styles

Styles defined in your document will be automatically recognized by the plugin including:


  • ✅ Text
  • ✅ Solid Colors
  • ✅ Linear Gradients
  • ✅ Angular Gradients
  • ✅ Drop Shadows
  • ✅ Layer Blurs
  • ✅ Grid styles


* Radial and diamond gradients are not currently supported.

* Inner shadow and background blur are not currently supported.


👉 Images

Requirements for adding images to Swift package:

  • Only vector images are supported
  • Images must be defined as components
  • Images must be wrapped in a frame named Images.swift


👉 Adding the Package to Xcode

  1. Unzip the exported file and drag the entire DesignSystem folder into the Xcode project navigator right below the project name.
  2. Add the DesignSystem package to Frameworks, Libraries and Embedded Content inside your projects general settings.
  3. Import the DesignSystem module in any views that you want to use design tokens with import DesignSystem


👉 Example Usage

  • .font(Font.DesignSystem.headline1)
  • .foregroundColor(Color.DesignSystem.primary)
  • .modifier(Effect.DesignSystem.Elevation1())
  • .padding(Spacing.DesignSystem.xSmall4)
  • Image.DesignSystem.welcome


👉 FAQs & Known Issues

  • Style names that contain numbers can sometimes cause issues in Xcode. For ex "blue/1" and "blue/-1" will cause an error)
  • Apple docs on adding custom fonts to Xcode
  • The Mac App Store version of Xcode has a bug that prevents packages from working. Download Xcode directly from Apple's Developer site to resolve. Apple Developer Site


Feedback and Support

  • For more information please visit: http://figmatoswift.com
  • For feedback, questions or support please reach out on Twitter or Email
plugins.tagline: Generate SwiftUI from your design tokens.

plugins.name: Ruyi Design Assistant - 如意设计助手
plugins.description:
Ruyi Design Assistant helps you efficiently use React component libraries and Design Tokens for design in Figma, conveniently obtain resources from open source icon libraries, and easily get production-level component code.


Component library: Design with the same code component library used by developers to build products. Simply drag and drop components and configure component properties to creat standardized visual representations.


Design Tokens: Easily view and use design system themes in Figma, with one-click quick switching of component themes.


Icon Plaza: The assistant connects to massive and popular open source icon libraries. Drag and drop icons to generate vector layer.


Code inspection: The assistant can accurately check every component code, component property value, and Design Token value used in the design file, eliminating the need to consult documentation outside the design tool and reducing translation deviation during the design-to-product process.


Learn more about plugin usage.


------


如意设计助手，助您在 Figma 中高效使用 React 组件库与 Design Tokens 做设计，便捷获取开源图标库资源，轻松获取生产级组件代码。


组件库：使用与开发者构建产品相同的代码组件库做设计，简单拖拽组件和配置组件属性即可获得规范化的视觉表现。


Design Tokens：轻松查看设计系统设计主题、一键切换组件主题生成对应主题的 figma 设计资源。


图标广场：助手连接海量流行的开源图标库素材。一键拖拽，生成矢量设计资源，助力设计提效。


代码检查：助手可以精准检查出设计稿中使用的每一个组件代码、组件属性值以及 Design Token值，无需跳出设计工具去查阅说明文档，减少设计转变为产品过程中的转译偏差。


了解更多插件使用方法
plugins.tagline: Ruyi Design Assistant helps you use React component libraries and Design Tokens for design.

plugins.name: Ghost Legacy
plugins.description:
Ghost is a lightweight plugin that converts high fidelity mockups to loading or “skeleton” screens.


Ghost Legacy is a fork of the original Ghost plugin created by @ckark with more features.


How it Works

Ghost Legacy replaces text and shape layers in a design with rectangles while preserving their dimensions. It removes the original layers and eliminates auto-layout to avoid anomalies when inserting children into frames, ensuring a faithful layout reproduction.


Test with [Try out] button


*Note: unpredictable things can happen with designs involving complex structures.


What’s new:

  • add new parameters with custom color support (Hex, Color name)
  • figjam friendly
  • documentation
  • minor bug fixes


Open source:

https://github.com/mrstev3n/ghost-legacy

plugins.name: Make Color Styles
plugins.description:
When you run this plugin, it looks through all your selection colors, and if there are any that aren't yet saved fill styles (or color styles, or Paint Styles as they're officially called), it saves them with the name of the element that has that fill.


This means you can make a lot of frames as swatches, name them all the way you want their color styles to be named, and save all the colors at once by selecting them together and running this plugin.


🎥 Here is a demo video showing how to use the plugin.


I made this to be able to move faster as I iterate on color palettes for kittycad.io. Come check out what we're building, it's infrastructure for hardware design tools!
plugins.tagline: Turn any unsaved fills in your selection into saved paint styles (aka color styles)

plugins.name: Aks - LTR to RTL
plugins.description:
Are you tired of dealing with two different versions (RTL and LTR) of your design at the same time? we have got your back! with Aks you can easily assign the translation to the text and convert the whole layout from LTR to RTL with one click!


The tool is specially designed for Urdu, Arabic, Persian, and other RTL languages.


Get your job done in three simple steps:


  1. Select the text and assign font and translation.
  2. Select and mark "Do not flip" to non-symmetrical elements.
  3. Select the main frame, and simply click the "Convert" button.


We promise it is as easy as it sounds :)

plugins.name: AI-Style Copy
plugins.description:
# AI 图像工具 (AI Image Tools)


一个强大的 Figma 插件，集成了多种 AI 驱动的图像处理功能，帮助设计师提高工作效率。


## 核心功能


### 🖼️ AI 扩图 (AI Expand)

- 智能扩展图片尺寸

- 保持图像质量和内容连贯性

- 完美解决设计素材尺寸不足的问题


### ✏️ AI 参考 (AI Reference)

- 智能参考风格样式

- 快速生成符合目标风格的图像

- 帮助设计师保持设计风格统一


### 🎭 AI 去背景 (AI Remove BG)

- 智能移除图片背景

- 支持多种去背景模式

- 快速获得透明背景的图像


### ✂️ AI 抠图 (AI Mask)

- 智能识别目标抠图

- 精准的边缘处理

- 支持复杂场景的目标提取


### 📝 AI 文生图 (AI Text to Image)

- 智能文本生成图像

- 支持多种风格预设

- 快速将创意转化为视觉效果


### 🎨 位图转矢量 (Bitmap to Vector)

- 智能转换为 SVG 矢量图

- 生成可缩放的矢量图形


## 特色优势


- 🎯 操作简单直观

- ⚡ 快速处理响应

- 🎨 专业效果输出

- 🔄 无缝工作流集成


## 适用场景


- UI/UX 设计

- 品牌设计

- 营销物料制作

- 社交媒体图片处理

- 电商产品图设计


## 技术特点


- 采用 AI绘画 模型

- 云端处理，本地轻量运行

- 支持批量处理

- 高质量图像输出


## 使用方法


1. 在 Figma 中安装插件

2. 选择需要处理的图层

3. 打开插件选择所需功能

4. 根据提示完成操作


让 AI 为您的设计工作提供强大助力，提升工作效率，实现更专业的设计效果。
plugins.tagline: Transform your designs with AI Image Toolbox—expand, refine, and create effortlessly!

plugins.name: Component Relinker
plugins.description:
The basic problem is this:

You have a workspace with components being linked across files within the workspace. You now want to migrate your files to a different workspace, but in the process, you find that the instances of components reference their root definitions from the old workspace.


This plugin works to solve that problem by, well, relinking the components.


Follow the below steps to get it working:

18165.name: Component Relinker
18165.description:
The basic problem is this:

You have a workspace with components being linked across files within the workspace. You now want to migrate your files to a different workspace, but in the process, you find that the instances of components reference their root definitions from the old workspace.


This plugin works to solve that problem by, well, relinking the components.


Follow the below steps to get it working:

  • First off, you need to make sure that your new workspace is on the Professional plan (or above)
  • Go to the file in the new workspace that holds the component definitions. a) We run our plugin, and press the button called "Select Library". b) We publish all components within this file.
  • Next, we go to the file which holds our component instances (currently they are linking back to the old workspace). We run the plugin, and a) In the dropdown, select the name of the file that holds the root definitions b) Press the button called "Relink Components"


And there it is. The plugin may take a few minutes to link the components up.
